meanings.definition: The quality of being kind and generous.
meanings.sent1: Her generosity towards others is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: I admire his generosity in helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: His generosity knows no bounds, even offering his last cookie to a friend.
meanings.sent4: The generosity of the sun, sharing its warmth with all living creatures.
meanings.sent5: The generosity of the teacher, always willing to help her students succeed.

meanings.definition: Willingness to give or share freely.
meanings.sent1: The charity event showcased the community's generosity.
meanings.sent2: Her generosity in donating to various causes is commendable.
meanings.sent3: His generosity in sharing his toys made him popular among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The river's generosity in providing water for all living beings.
meanings.sent5: The generosity of time, freely given to those in need.

meanings.sent1: The generosity of the volunteers made the event a success.
meanings.sent2: Their generosity in donating food to the shelter was appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed generosity by bringing a mouse as a gift to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The generosity of the wind, carrying seeds to new places.
meanings.sent5: The generosity of the artist, sharing their creations with the world.
